info.name: Place Detail API
info.description: API endpoint for getting comprehensive place details including images, nearby hotels and restaurants using geographical proximity (Haversine formula)

variable.description: The ID of the place to get details for

request.description:
Get complete details about a specific place in a single organized response:

**Returns:**
- `placeDetail[]` - Full place information (name, description, ratings, coordinates, etc.)
- `listOfImageUrl[]` - Array of image URLs
- `imagePublicIds[]` - Array of Cloudinary public IDs
- `hotelNearby[]` - Up to 5 nearby hotels (within 10km, category_id = 3)
- `restaurantNearby[]` - Up to 5 nearby restaurants (within 10km, category_id = 2)

**Nearby Search:**
- Uses Haversine formula for accurate distance calculation
- Sorted by distance (closest first), then rating (highest first)
- Default radius: 10 km
- Default limit: 5 results per category
